General.Name: Shenzhen Coship Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Coship Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of smart home products and services worldwide. The company offers terminal products, middleware products, smart platform products, and operation business products and other products and services. Its products include Internet products, software and hardware solutions, smart platforms, big-data platforms, interactive live broadcast platforms, VR and panorama, MOUI management systems, message engine systems, terminal software intelligent upgrade systems, advertising systems, monitoring platform, and terminal network management systems. The company also offers Internet of things platforms, which includes urban internet of things, smart building/park/building solutions, ping an smart community solution, smart warehousing solution, smart campus solution, intelligent meeting management, security management, access control visitor management, fire management, elevator management, building control management, environmental monitoring management, energy consumption monitoring and management, multimedia information release, parking management, human room intelligent management, event management, smart restaurant management, intelligent toilet management, and emergency management system. In addition, it engages in manufacturing and sale of batteries and equipment. Shenzhen Coship Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Daoyu  Liu
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
